## WebOIDCContainer.finishAuthorization() method

Finish authorization

exchangeToken read window.location. It checks if error is present and rejects with OAuthError. Otherwise assume code is present, make a token request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
finishAuthorization(): Promise<{
        user: User;
        state?: string;
    }>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<{
        user: User;
        state?: string;
    }>`
